data.description: It is a city on the northeastern coast of Spain. It is the capital and largest city of the autonomous community of Catalonia, as well as the second most populous municipality of Spain.
data.name: Barcelona

data.description: It is a city in the province of Río Negro, Argentina, situated in the foothills of the Andes on the southern shores of Nahuel Huapi Lake. It is located within the Nahuel Huapi National Park.
data.name: Bariloche

data.description: It is the capital and largest city of the Commonwealth of Massachusetts and the cultural and financial center of the New England region of the Northeastern United States.
data.name: Boston

data.description: Budapest, which is both a city and county, forms the centre of the Budapest metropolitan area, which has an area of 7,626 square kilometres.
data.name: Budapest

data.description: The city is located on the western shore of the Río de la Plata, on South America's southeastern coast. Buenos Aires is classified as an alpha global city, according to the Globalization and World Cities Research Network (GaWC) 2020 ranking.
data.name: Buenos Aires

data.description: Caracas is located along the Guaire River in the northern part of the country, within the Caracas Valley of the Venezuelan coastal mountain range (Cordillera de la Costa).
data.name: Caracas

data.description: It is a city and one of the major ports on the northern coast of Colombia in the Caribbean Coast Region, bordering the Caribbean sea.
data.name: Cartagena

data.description: It is the most populous city in the United Arab Emirates (UAE) and the capital of the Emirate of Dubai, the most populated of the 7 emirates of the United Arab Emirates.
data.name: Dubai

data.description: It is the most populous city in the German state of Hesse. Its 791,000 inhabitants as of 2022 make it the fifth-most populous city in Germany.
data.name: Frankfurt

data.description: Situated in the south west of the country, where the Rhône exits Lake Geneva, it is the capital of the Republic and Canton of Geneva.
data.name: Geneva

data.description: Haiti is a Caribbean country that shares the island of Hispaniola with the Dominican Republic to the east. Despite recovering from the 2010 earthquake, many of Haiti's monuments dating from the early 19th century remain intact.
data.name: Puerto Principe

data.description: India is a vast South Asian country with a diverse terrain ranging from the heights of the Himalayas to the coast of the Indian Ocean. It has a history of more than 5 millennia,
data.name: New Delhi

data.description: Japan is an island nation in the Pacific Ocean with dense cities, imperial palaces, parks mountainous national parks and thousands of shrines and temples
data.name: Tokyo

data.description: Kenya is a country in East Africa with a coastline on the Indian Ocean. Its territory covers savannah,terrains in lakes, the spectacular Great Rift Valley and high mountain areas. It is also home to wildlife such as lions, elephants and rhinos.
data.name: Nairobi

data.description: Lebanon, officially the Lebanese Republic, is an Arab country in the Middle East bordered on the south byIsrael, to the north and east with Syria, and to the west with the Mediterranean Sea. In the cities of Baalbek, Tire and Byblos, there are Roman temples and also Phoenician sanctuaries. Its official language is Arabic.
data.name: Beirut

data.description: Madagascar is a huge island nation off the southeastern coast of Africa. It is home to thousands of species animals, such as lemurs, that are only found in this place, along with tropical forests, beaches and reefs.Near the busy capital, Antananarivo, is Ambohimanga, a complex of royal palaces and cemeteries inthe hillside, along with the “baobabs avenue”, a dirt road lined with enormous trees with centuries ofantiquity.
data.name: Antananarivo

data.description: Nepal is a country located between India and Tibet, famous for its temples and the Himalayan mountains,among which is Everest. Kathmandu, the capital, has a labyrinthine old quarter full of Hindu and Buddhist shrines. Around the Kathmandu Valley are Swayambhunath, a Buddhist temple that houses monkeys
data.name: Kathmandu

data.description: Qatar, officially known as the State of Qatar, is a sovereign Arab state located in westernAsia and which occupies the small peninsula of the same name in the east of the Arabian peninsula
data.name: Doha

data.description: Dominican Republic is a Caribbean country that shares the island of Hispaniola with Haiti to the west. It isknown for its beaches, resorts and golf areas. Its terrain includes tropical forests, savannah and lands  high, including Pico Duarte, the highest mountain in the Caribbean
data.name: Santo Domingo

data.description: Samoa is a country that encompasses the westernmost group of the Samoan archipelago, in Polynesia. Manyof its islands have reef-fringed beaches and rugged interiors covered in tropical forests withgorges and waterfalls
data.name: Apia

data.description: Thailand is a country in Southeast Asia. It is famous for its tropical beaches, opulent palacesroyal palaces, ancient ruins, and temples adorned with Buddha figures
data.name: Bankok

data.description: Ukraine is a large country in Eastern Europe known for its Orthodox churches, the coastline on the seaBlack and wooded mountains. Its capital, kyiv, boasts the gold-domed Saint Sophia Cathedral, withmosaics and frescoes from the 11th century.
data.name: kyiv

data.description: Venezuela is a country on the north coast of South America, with various natural attractions.Along its coast in the Caribbean, there are tropical tourist islands, among them the Isla de Margarita and the archipelago The Roques
data.name: Caracas
